briefTitle: Aurinia Renal Assessments 2: Aurinia Renal Response in Lupus With Voclosporin
officialTitle: A Randomized, Controlled, Double-blind, Continuation Study Comparing the Long-term Safety and Efficacy of Voclosporin (23.7 mg Twice Daily) With Placebo in Subjects With Lupus Nephritis
summary: The purpose of this study is assess the long-term safety and tolerability of voclosporin compared with placebo for up to an additional 24 months following completion of treatment in the AURORA 1 study in subjects with lupus nephritis (LN).

primaryOutcome.measure: Adverse Events (AE) Profile and Routine Biochemical and Hematological Assessments.
